text: they say they only want what's best for
their critically ill child but Brett and
the gamer King have now spent another
night in custody accused of his neglect
the couple who are being held at this
prison in Madrid haven't been charged
with any offense and the Crown
Prosecution Service in the UK has now
announced that the case is under
immediate review if lawyers decide there
isn't enough evidence or that a
prosecution wouldn't be in the public
interest the couple will be free to go a
european arrest warrant was put out for
the pair at the request of Hampshire
Police and they were taken into custody
on Saturday night after appearing in
court yesterday and refusing to be
extradited a Spanish judge ordered the
Kings to be jailed while he considered
granting bail meanwhile Asher is being
cared for under police guard hundreds of
miles away in the south of Spain at a
hospital in Malaga his older brother was
allowed to visit him for the first time
last night it's thought the Kings
traveled to Spain to sell the holiday
home in order to pay for cancer
treatment the NHS would not provide
clinic offering the proton beam therapy
in the Czech Republic says it's ready
and willing to treat the little boy if
the cps does decide to drop the case
against his parents it's possible that
Asher could be about to be moved to yet
another foreign country John brane BBC
news
